articles.content: Todd Boehly's consortium seem set to complete the purchase of Chelsea in the coming weeks and the American billionaire has held a couple of crunch meetings this week. Men's team manager Thomas Tuchel… [+1935 chars]

articles.title: Pep Guardiola TEARS INTO Patrice Evra and Dimitar Berbatov for questioning his ability - Daily Mail
articles.description: Both Patrice Evra and Dimitar Berbatov featured for Man United in their chastening defeat in 2009, while the former also came out second best in the same clash in the 2011 final.
articles.content:
Pep Guardiola hit out at criticism of his management and said Manchester City's response to the dramatic defeat by Real Madrid is proof the squad possess character.

articles.author: Ian Ladyman
articles.title: Antonio Conte admits he was 'the crazy one' for taking the Tottenham job after Arsenal win - Daily Mail
articles.description: Spurs hammered Arsenal 3-0 at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on Thursday night to go within a point of their bitter rivals with two games to go in the race for the final Champions League spot.
articles.content:
Antonio Conte has admitted that his threat to quit Tottenham after a defeat at Burnley in February was a premeditated stunt to try and prompt change at the club.
